reasoning: A JavaScript TypeError occurred in ModuleDialog.js when clicking to add the HTML Pro module, preventing the module from being added to the Content Layout pane. This is a real code error, not a test tool misunderstanding.
evidence_summary: Screenshot 1 shows the Add Module dialog opened correctly. Screenshot 2 shows HTML Pro was clicked (highlighted blue) but the dialog remained open and the module was never added. The test logged a specific JS error: TypeError at ModuleDialog.js:1025:30, indicating a null/undefined reference bug in the module addition code path.
scenario_id: ContentLayout::Module Placement in Columns::Add module to Content Layout pane
